@ baaam96: it's not exactly like this but The Great Escape's heroine, Ai Sugimoto, is seemingly incapable of refusing sex once she gets turned on but she's still completely in love with her boyfriend.  By the fourth volume of the series, I think she's had sex with around twenty other men, but still 100% in love with her boyfriend.
I really wish there was a sequel to this one.  Natsumi reminds me of Ai Sugimoto.  A total slut but also really in love with her boyfriend.
